briefTitle: A Clinical Study of MK0991 (Caspofungin) in Japanese Patients With Deep-seated Candida or Aspergillus Infections (0991-062)(COMPLETED)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-Blind, Comparative Study of MK0991 (Caspofungin) Versus Micafungin in Adult Japanese Patients With Deep-seated Candida or Aspergillus Infections
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and efficacy of MK0991 in patients with deep-seated mycoses.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Significant Drug-related Adverse Experience
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 1-4 weeks for esophageal candidiasis, 2-8 weeks for invasive candidiasis, 2-12 weeks for aspergillosis
